## ITileDataVisitor.visitLine() method

Visits a line object with the specified `featureId`<!-- -->; use `pointAccessor` to get the object's properties.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
visitLine(featureId: number | undefined, lineAccessor: ILineAccessor): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  featureId | number \| undefined |  |
|  lineAccessor | [ILineAccessor](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
